detectors.description:
BPTPoolUNI.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolUNI.sol#710-726) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolUNI.sol#716)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolUNI.sol#719)
detectors.markdown:
[BPTPoolUNI.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BPTPoolUNI.sol#L710-L726) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
